title: What are some free tools for making your content better? - Quora

response.answer_text: Check out the list of tools which I personally use to create effective content and manage it in an automated way: Adobe Spark [Paid] Create quick social graphics, short intro videos, attractive flyers for product launch, and more from this amazing tool from Adobe. Even if you are not a pro at creating graphics, this tool will guide you through. Venngage [Freemium] Who doesn’t love infographics? It’s the ultimate source of creating engagement online. But’s creatine one is not an easy task if we take a traditional long-haul way. Use this tool to create quick infographics. Piktochart [Freemium] Piktochart is a bucket of small tools that allows you to do more in less time. Need images, GIFs, Infographics, editing photos, this is your on the go companion. Canva [Freemium] Canva is a super-fast and easy-to-create graphics tool that lets you use their pre-made templates and solve your purpose. Be it Facebook post, banner, Twitter post, Instagram correct image size post, or a simple digital postcard, this is a powerhouse. Recordit [Free] This is a simple screen recorder that lets you quickly take a screenshot or a video, fulfills the purpose without overloading your system Kap [Free] It’s an open-source tool which is a great screen recorder. You can also check out the Git repository. Adobe Color CC [Free] Need an accurate color picker? This simple and free tool from Adobe is all you need to have in your collection. If you are starting with web designing and learning the color codes, this site will help.

For writing a compelling content, you must required help from selecting the title of your post. For title selections, you can use following tools and extensions:- Buzzsumo (Freemium)World's First AI-Powered Platform for Creating Questions (Free)Keywords Everywhere (Free Chrome Extension)After title selections, you must be looking forward for keywords, especially if you are writing for search friendly content. For that, you can check keywords, related keywords, questions etc with the help of following tools:- UbersuggestGoogle Keywords PlannerGoogle TrendsAfter keywords selection for the content, you must be looking forward for heading tags, no. Of words and other ideas. You can spy your competitors for the same with the help of following tools:- SEOquake Chrome Extension (Freemium)After writing the content, you must check your reading level and grammatical or spelling errors in the article. You required following tools for those:- FREE READABILITY TOOLS : READABILITY SOFTWAREdatayzeGrammarly Chrome Extension (Freemium)Ginger Software (Freemium)Free online translation, dictionaryIf you hire a writer for your work, so plagiarism check is mandatory Copyscape (Freemium)SmallSeoTools (free) but not very reliableOnce you finish this, you must need free stock images or creatives also. You can consider following tools for this:- PixabayFreepikCanvas.comWhat else do you need for your work? Tell me in the comments, i will try to help you.
